items.title: Firefox is adding a switch to turn AI features off
items.summary: Unlike many of the companies stuffing AI into their browsers, Mozilla will soon give you a way to turn all of these features off. An update coming on February 24th will add a new "AI control" option to Firefox's settings menu, allowing you to disable or enable the browser's individual AI features, â€¦

items.title: iPhone Fold to pack Apple's biggest smartphone battery yet, here's how large it will be
items.summary: Apple's iPhone Fold is coming out later this year, the rumor consensus agrees. The device will have a very different form factor to what we've seen in the Android world, and according to a new rumor from China today, it will also come with the biggest battery Apple has ever put in a smartphone. Bacâ€¦

items.title: Skater cannot perform to Minions music at Olympics
items.summary: Spanish figure skater Tomas-Llorenc Guarino Sabate will not be able to perform to his usual music - a Minions mix - at the 2026 Winter Olympics because of a copyright issue.

items.title: Is Benzema joining rivals behind Ronaldo's frustration in Saudi Arabia?
items.summary: Cristiano Ronaldo's future at Al-Nassr is plunged into doubt after he is left out of their squad for Monday's Saudi Pro League game against Al-Riyadh.

items.title: Trump administration plans $12bn critical minerals stockpile to offset China supply risk â€” initiative to create 60-day reserve of rare earths for electronics manufacturing
items.summary: The Trump administration will soon launch a $12 billion critical minerals stockpile designed to insulate U.S. manufacturing from supply disruptions tied to Chinaâ€™s dominance of mining and refining.

items.title: Solanke scorpion kick helps Spurs fight back against Man City
items.summary: Dominic Solanke scores twice, including a spectacular scorpion kick, as Tottenham come from behind to draw against Manchester City with a rousing second-half performance.

items.title: Sesko scores dramatic late winner as Man Utd beat Fulham
items.summary: Manchester United avoided Fulham's late comeback due to a Benjamin Sesko goal in stoppage time to give United three points and continue head coach Michael Carrick's perfect start.

items.title: 10-man Brentford hold on for hard-fought win at Villa
items.summary: Brentford hold on to an important win against Aston Villa, despite Kevin Schade's sending off during the first half.
